4.plain:
hi, Actually that is Line Item Sub Total, here you go function display_fieldd ( $cart_subtotal, $cart_item, $cart_item_key ) { echo $cart_subtotal. '
'; } add_filter ( "woocommerce_cart_item_subtotal", "display_fieldd"); Regards Sark On Monday 05 January 2015 01:03 PM, rasib khan wrote: > hi > i want to add field for each product in cart page next to total not > sub total i.e when we add product in cart we view a table in cart page > with thumbnail ,product name ,quantity,size and total i want to add > here one more field it can be done by hard code but i want to do with > your method > > -- > Regards > Rasib Khan >

5.html:
Hi,
'get_post_meta()' in the 'tshirt_name_validation()' needs product id ( i mean the post id ). the global $post->ID won't be available at the time of calling tshirt_name_validation().
try this
function tshirt_name_validation( $flaq, $product_id, $quantity ) {
    $custom_data = $_REQUEST['properties'];    
    $test = get_post_meta( $product_id,'_select', true );

    if (!empty($test)) {
        if ( empty( $custom_data['name'] ) ) {
            wc_add_notice( __( 'Please enter a Name for Printing…', 'woocommerce' ), 'error' );
            return false;
        }
        return true;
    } else{}
}
add_filter ( 'woocommerce_add_to_cart_validation', 'tshirt_name_validation' );



Regards 
Sark

On Tuesday 06 January 2015 05:40 PM, Wei Tian wrote:
function tshirt_name_validation() {
$custom_data = $_REQUEST['properties'];
global $post;
$test = get_post_meta($post->ID,'_select',true);
if (!empty($test)) {
if ( empty( $custom_data['name'] ) ) {
wc_add_notice( __( 'Please enter a Name for Printing…', 'woocommerce' ), 'error' );
return false;
}
return true;
}
else{
...
}
}
add_action( 'woocommerce_add_to_cart_validation', 'tshirt_name_validation', 1, 5 );

6.html:
hi,

my mistake, need to add priority and number of argument expected as param.
Try this

add_filter ( 'woocommerce_add_to_cart_validation', 'tshirt_name_validation', 1, 5 );


Regards
Sark



On Tuesday 06 January 2015 07:25 PM, Wei Tian wrote:
Hi Sark,

i get the error ( ! ) Warning: Missing argument 2 for tshirt_name_validation() in C:\wamp\www\wordpress\wp-content\themes\bazar\functions.php on line 79

Thanks for the quick reply. If i define $product_id=552 in the method i will get the value i want, how do i pass this $product_id value dynamically to this function? upon clicking add to cart. Sorry i might be asking the wrong stuffs, please bear with my inadequate understanding of the core coding.

function tshirt_name_validation( $flaq=null, $product_id, $quantity=null ) {
    $custom_data = $_REQUEST['properties'];    
    $test = get_post_meta( $product_id,'_select', true );
     if (!empty($test)) {
        if ( empty( $custom_data['name'] ) ) {
            wc_add_notice( __( 'Please enter a Name for Printing…', 'woocommerce' ), 'error' );
            return false;
        }
        return true;
    } else{wc_add_notice( __( $test.'test', 'woocommerce' ), 'error' );}
}
add_filter ( 'woocommerce_add_to_cart_validation', 'tshirt_name_validation' );

Sorry my battery went down,

I am currently going through the theme, getting used to it.

Here is the plan.

Phase 1

1) Top & main menu Fixed
2) Equipped with md slider
3) Enquiry Popup for ( for student to drop their details )

Phase 2

1) Unrestricted Reviews
2) Sidebar menu cleanup


Release Plan

2) I will sent you the phase 2 modified theme on ( 14/01/2015 - wed )

10.html:
Hi,

Please find the modified theme here : http://sarkutils.in/wplms.zip

1) Backup your current (wplms) theme.
2) delete your current theme folder and paste the modified theme there.
3) that's it.


Modification
    1) Fixed header
    2) Sign up pop up


Modified Files
    1) header.php
    2) footer.php
    3) functions.php

   
New Files
    1) css/custom/techzenius.css
    2) css/custom/jBox.css
    3) js/custom/jBox.min.js


Plugins
    1) jBox popup plugin ( http://stephanwagner.me/jBox )



Note:
1) I haven't included the modified slider yet ( the existing slider continues to work ).
2) Each sign up entries captured into Signup post type ( you can find the "Signups" menu at the wp-admin  )
3) Email notification will be added soon ( once i get your email setup details )



Regards
Sark

14.html:
Hi Alex,

I am glad you did,

As i have told you already this application solve one of the fundamental Shopify gap ( OR rules based product filtering )
If you have done any Shopify Theme development, you know the customers ( as well as developers ) pain point when it comes to product grouping, sub grouping and building sidebar that behaves like a top ecommerce sites ( why, because that's how customer used to use ecommerce sites ).


USP of this app would be

1) OR rules based filtering
2) Create filters based on Tags, Vendors, Product Types, Product Options and Product Pricing.
3) Simple three steps process for creating filters ( no brain required )
4) An initiative Drag & Drop UI to design your filters
5) Choose existing templates or customize their own sidebar and product grid template using visual builder ( which under development ). or we are always their to help them.


As you are already an established Shopify App vendor and you still think this app doesn't have any USP, then i am sure that this app is not gonna do well.

( but i think it will do well because i am one hell of Shopify theme developer and i know the developers pain point well :)


Regards
Sark

Hi Sark,

Gone through it and it seems a really powerful app. The main issue is to be able to really communicate well with merchant what are the apps possibilities and power.

On Fri, Jan 23, 2015 at 4:22 PM, parthibn boxing <parthibnboxing@gmail.com> wrote:
Product description

Vanjiram:
This is also known as seer fish. It is the most popular variety of seafood in Tamilnadu.
It is normally available as thin slices or as fillets. It is preferred for making fish curry and fish fry preparations.
Children love its taste and texture as it does not contain bones except the central bone.

Prawns:
PRAWNS have a high protein content and they belong to the shell fish family. Various species of prawns are available
which are varying in size also. Sizes are normally referred to in counts of 10/20/30/50/100 etc per kg.
Distinct taste and structure of prawns are preferred by all fish eaters. It lends itself to various types
of preparation including prawn curry, prawn fry, prawn briyani etc.

Pomfrets:
There are three most popular varieties of this fish namely white pomfrets, black pomfrets and Chinese pomfrets.
The unique taste and texture of the meat is preferred by all consumers. They can easily be called one of the
finest species of fish considering their quality & price.

Sea Crab:       
Many Seafood eaters prefer this because of the smooth and succulent meat it contains.

Aylai:
This is the national fish of India and is widely available and consumed by most of the Indian community, especially,
in Tamilnadu and Kerala. There are many varieties which are known by different names.
All these varieties are very popular amongst Indian consumers.

Sankara:
Another tasty fish available widely all along the East and West coasts of India. It requires careful processing
and care while eating because of its sharp bones.

Mathi            
This is an oil rich fish which is very tasty and healthy because of its rich omega-3 fatty acid content which is beneficial
for heart patients. Omega-3 fatty acid reduces the cholesterol content in the blood stream and helps to keep the blood
flow in the body smooth and easy. It has many other health benefits also.

Parai       
This is also known as Malabar Jack and Malabar King Fish. It is available throughout the Indian Coastal waters. It is a
favorite of all fish eaters, especially in the fried form.

Seela
Barracuda is a popular variety of fish, which is liked bymost of the fish eaters. It is available as fillets or steaks.
Traditionally they are preferred for making preparations such as fish curry and fish fry.

kaala
It is widely available in both East & West coasts of India. The white succulent meat of this fish lends itself to
various preparations and has great taste too.

Nethili
Anchovy is a significant source of food for almost all the fish eating population in India. They are a small variety of fish
and can be prepared as tasty fish curry, fish fry etc. It is preferred for its pungent taste and property of reducing bad cholesterol from our body.

Kilangan   
This fish is widely consumed by sea food lovers. It has a tasty soft meat which is liked by one and all.

Sura
Sharks are large, long-lived species at the top of the food chain. Shark is a good source of vitamin B12, selenium and omega-3 fatty acids.

Karapodi
Popular small fish of Tamilnadu suitable for making gravy .

Koduva
It is also known as Barramundi Fish. This fish variety is available throughout the eastern and western coasts of India. It is preferred
for the tasty fish curry preparation and the fillets can be consumed by all the fish eating segments.

Tiger Prawns:    
Tiger Prawns are normally caught from the wild. It is also known as BLACK TIGER SHRIMP because of the Dark Strips on its Shell.
They are preferred for their great taste.

Live Lobster:    
Lobsters are considered to be all time delicacy by all the discerning seafood lovers. They are available in different varieties & sizes
and are preferred by many seafood consumers for the distinct flavor of their meat.

White Pomfret:    
This is also known as Silver Pomfret and has a huge demand especially in the west coast of India. It has very smooth and soft muscle
which is liked by all fish eaters. It has many health benefits because of the Vitamin content.

Mud Crabs:    
Many Seafood eaters prefer this because of the smooth and succulent meat it contains.

Squid :    
Squids belong to the family of Cephalopods. Squid is a good source for zinc, manganese and high in the recommended daily intake of
copper, selenium B12, and riboflavin. Therefore many sea food consumers specifically ask for this item.

Oysters :    
The word Oyster is used as a common name for a number of distinct groups of bivalve mollusks which live in marine or brackish habits.
The valves are highly calcified. Some kinds of Oyster are commonly consumed, cooked or raw, by humans. These are considered an
aphrodisiac. Other kinds, such as pearl oysters, are not eaten by humans, though they are edible.

Soorai :    
Ahi, also known as yellowfin tuna.The protein content accounts for 50 percent of the daily value of protein.Ahi is densely packed with
B vitamins.A serving delivers 19 percent of the DRI for phosphorus, 10 percent of the DRI for potassium and 9 percent of the DRI for magnesium.

Soorai 2 :   
It is the favourite fish of the Japanese and mainly used in Sushi and Sashimi preparations

Parla :    
Add mahi-mahi to your diet to boost your vitamin intake, particularly vitamins B-5 and B-6. Both nutrients help your cells function properly
by supporting cellular metabolism.Mahi-mahi also contains a scant 1.2 grams of fat per 6-ounce serving, making it a very lean source of protein.

Nakku Meen
Sole is a fish of the family Soleidae. They are found in temperate and tropical seas. Sole is a flatfish with a somewhat elongated shape.






Thanks & best wishes
mp

Hi All,


If I understand correctly most of the functionalities are same except the following

Function
1) Create customer group, if they chose to.
2) Register user in Learn Upon if they already doesn't exist.

UI
1) we can add one check box for creating customer group


note:

Once the order has been placed in Shopify we have no control over the Thank You Page( there is no template for that ).
If you truly need to automate this workflow, this has to be done from cart page only.


Time Estimation

1) cart page customization - 16 hours

2) PHP module - 36 hours



Regards
Saravana Kumar K
